body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries            Trip Itineraries        Here for a few hours?  Or, a few days?  Either way, start at the Independence Visitor Center at 6th and Market Streets. NPS photo       Begin your visit at the Independence Visitor Center for information, exhibits, and tour tickets.  Staff can answer questions and help you plan your visit.  Ask about seasonal programs, special activities for families, and services for non-English-speaking visitors.   The park sites and stories include everything from political history to science to art and architecture.  Whatever your interests, there is something for everyone.  Follow the trip itineraries below, or download the FREE mobile app and explore the park using our five thematic audio tours.  Building hours vary, so make sure you consult the operating hours when planning your trip.      "Must Sees"         Family Friendly       Military History       School Field Trips
title: Independence National Historical Park: Trip Itineraries
